comment: She is the best ever! very knowledgeable about the material.. i definetly will recommend her...

She's a nice woman but she speeds thru the classwork, not giving you a chance to grasp the material or ask questions. She copies problems from the book but often makes mistakes from rushing. Several people have dropped the class and of the few left, most are failing because they don't have time to go to tutoring on top of attending her class.
Great teacher made learning easy. Helpful with questions and thorough reviews before each test. Recommended
Awesome math teacher.  Wished there were more like her!!
She's great. Good at getting you back into the swing of things if you have been out of school for awhile and forgot all about math. very nice lady too
